documentation.title: Doc Comment
documentation.standard: Enforces several rules related to the formatting of DocBlocks in PHP code.

code.title: Valid: DocBlock with some content.
Invalid: Empty DocBlock.

documentation.standard: The opening and closing DocBlock tags must be the only content on the line.

code.title: Valid: The opening and closing DocBlock tags are the only content on the line.
Invalid: The opening and closing DocBlock tags are not the only content on the line.

documentation.standard: There must be no additional blank lines before the closing DocBlock tag.

code.title: Valid: no additional blank lines before the closing DocBlock tag.
Invalid: additional blank lines before the closing DocBlock tag.

documentation.standard: The DocBlock must have a short description.

code.title: Valid: DocBlock with a short description.
Invalid: DocBlock without a short description.

documentation.standard: Short description must be on the first line of the DocBlock.

code.title: Valid: No blank lines before the short description.
Invalid: Blank lines before the short description.

documentation.standard: The short and long descriptions must start with a capital letter.

code.title: Valid: Short and long descriptions start with a capital letter.
Invalid: Short or long descriptions don't start with a capital letter.

documentation.standard: There must be exactly one blank line separating the short description, the long description and tag groups.

code.title: Valid: One blank line separating the short description, the long description and tag groups.
Invalid: More than one or no blank line separating the short description, the long description and tag groups.

documentation.standard: Parameter tags must be grouped together.

code.title: Valid: Parameter tags grouped together.
Invalid: Parameter tags not grouped together.

documentation.standard: Parameter tags must not be grouped together with other tags.

code.title: Valid: Parameter tags are not grouped together with other tags.

code_comparison.code: /** * Short description. * * @param int $foo * * @author Some Author * @return int */

code.title: Invalid: Parameter tags grouped together with other tags.

code_comparison.code: /** * Short description. * * @param int $foo * @author Some Author * @return int */

documentation.standard: Tag values for different tags in the same group must be aligned with each other.

code.title: Valid: Tag values for different tags in the same tag group are aligned with each other.
Invalid: Tag values for different tags in the same tag group are not aligned with each other.

documentation.standard: Parameter tags must be defined before other tags in a DocBlock.

code.title: Valid: Parameter tags are defined first.
Invalid: Parameter tags are not defined first.
